Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan has gained confidence after convincing wins over Bangladesh and Sri Lanka, while Sri Lanka aims to win this game after their first-series victory.
Najibullah Zadran has been in fine shape in recent matches, scoring 43 runs in just 17 balls at a strike rate of 252.94.
Hazratullah Zazai is expected to make a good start as the opener for Afghanistan, having scored 111 runs in the last 5 matches.
Pathum Nissanka will carry a huge responsibility as the opener for Sri Lanka, having scored 50 runs in the last 5 matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 7th match will be played in Sharjah Cricket Association Stadium on 3 September 2022 at 7:30 PM.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz is expected to perform well as the wicket-keeper for Afghanistan, having scored 132 runs in the last 5 matches.
Others: SL vs AFG Probable Playing 11 for both teams are mentioned in the article.
Dream11 Captain and Vice-Captain choices are suggested, including Wanindu Hasaranga, Rashid Khan, Mohammad Nabi, and Kusal Mendis.
